overview: Survivor Series (2015) is an upcoming professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event produced by WWE. It will take place on November 22, 2015 at Philips Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. It will be the twenty-ninth event under the Survivor Series chronology. It will be the first Survivor Series to take place in Georgia. The event will celebrate The Undertaker's 25-year tenure in WWE.
title: WWE Survivor Series 2015
